name: The Balcony
description: 'The Balcony' is a challenging, yet satisfying physics based game. The game consists of two game types; the campaign and the zombie mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 99 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse required
